title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 610.5 - Authority of committee on character and fitness to require additional proof
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 610.5 - Authority of committee on character and fitness to require additional proof

State Regulations

The committee on character and fitness
may in any case require the applicant to submit such additional proof or
information as it may deem appropriate and may also require the applicant to
submit a report of the National Conference of Bar Examiners with respect to his
character and qualifications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
610.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
